edu.umass.cs.gigapaxos.deprecated

Class AbstractPaxosManager<NodeIdType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.gigapaxos.deprecated.AbstractPaxosManager<NodeIdType>
  • Type Parameters:
    NodeIdType -
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public abstract class AbstractPaxosManager<NodeIdType>
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class is deprecated and was used mainly to transition from the old paxos implementation to the new one. It currently exists only for backwards compatibility reasons.

    • Method Detail

      • createPaxosInstance

        public abstract boolean createPaxosInstance(java.lang.String paxosIDNoVersion,
                                            short version,
                                            java.util.Set<NodeIdType> nodeIDs,
                                            Replicable paxosInterface)
        Deprecated. 
        Parameters:
        paxosIDNoVersion - paxos ID of paxos instance excluding the version number
        version - number of times member set has been changed for this paxos ID
        nodeIDs - node IDs of all members
        paxosInterface - initial state of data which this paxos instance is managing.
        Returns:
        true if paxos instance is created. false if another instance with same ID and version already exists, or size of nodeIDs is less than 3.

      • getPaxosNodeIDs

        public abstract java.util.Set<NodeIdType> getPaxosNodeIDs(java.lang.String paxosID)
        Deprecated. 
        Parameters:
        paxosID -
        Returns:
        The set of nodes corresponding to paxosID.

      • propose

        public abstract java.lang.String propose(java.lang.String paxosIDNoVersion,
                                         java.lang.String value)
        Deprecated. 
        Propose requestPacket in the paxos instance with the given paxosID. ReqeustPacket.clientID is used to distinguish which method proposed this value.
        Parameters:
        paxosIDNoVersion - paxosID of the paxos group excluding version number
        value - request to be proposed
        Returns:
        NULL if no paxos instance with given paxos ID was found, returns paxosIDNoVersion otherwise.

      • proposeStop

        public abstract java.lang.String proposeStop(java.lang.String paxosID,
                                             java.lang.String value,
                                             short version)
        Deprecated. 
        Parameters:
        paxosID -
        value -
        version -
        Returns:
        The paxosID and version to which this stop was issued.

        public abstract void handleIncomingPacket(org.json.JSONObject json)
        Deprecated. 
        Handle incoming message for any Paxos instance as well as failure detection messages.
        Parameters:
        json - json object received

      • resetAll

        public abstract void resetAll()
        Deprecated. 
        Deletes all paxos instances and paxos logs.
